context_bundle.content:
Clean Architecture layers.

Layers (inside-out):
1. Entities: Enterprise business rules
2. Use Cases: Application business rules
3. Interface Adapters: Controllers, presenters, gateways
4. Frameworks & Drivers: DB, web, UI

Dependency Rule:
Dependencies point inward. Inner layers know nothing of outer layers.

Benefits:
- Framework independent
- Testable
- UI independent
- Database independent

Testing Strategy:
- Unit test use cases with mocked gateways
- Integration test adapters
- E2E test through frameworks
